serversidehorror.commands.locate.structu: Couldn't find the structure you were looking for because it is disabled in the config
The grace period is not over yet, so traps cannot generate
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.break_torc: Chance for random torches to be destroyed per tick
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.burn_down_: Chance for a player to wake up to their house burning down
Enable starting fires when players wake up
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.fake_joine: Chance for a fake player to join per tick
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.fake_minin: Chance for a player to hear fake mining noises per tick
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.fake_steps: Chance for a player to hear fake footsteps per tick
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.grace_peri: Delay in days at the start of the game before this mod becomes active
Prevent traps from generating until the grace period is over
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.heads_from: Chance for a head from the list to spawn near a player
Enable spawning heads from the list
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.herobrine_: Chance for Herobrine to appear and stare at a player per tick
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.joining_in: Chance for a player to rejoin in an underground dungeon
Enable players rejoining in an underground dungeon
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.joining_on: Chance for a player to rejoin on a bedrock block at the build limit
Enable players rejoining at the build limit
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.jumpscare_: Chance for a player to be jump-scared per tick
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.long_night: Chance for a night to become a long night
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.old_villag: Enable old villages to generate in your world
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.random_fak: Chance for a fake player to join per tick
List of fake players and their messages
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.random_hea: Chance for a random player's head to spawn
Enable spawning heads of random players
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.random_lig: Chance for a player to be struck by lightning per tick
Enable random lightning strikes on players
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.random_sig: Chance for a random sign to be placed near a player per tick
Enable placing random signs near players
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.removing_l: Chance for leaves to be removed from forests per tick
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.replace_to: Chance for torches to be replaced with redstone torches per tick
Enable replacing random torches with redstone torches
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.setting_up: Chance for a new trap to be set up near a random player per tick
Enable setting up new traps near players
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.starer_cha: Chance for a fake player to spawn per tick
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.starer_lis: List of fake players and their messages
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.title: Server-Side Horror Config
serversidehorror.deimosconfig.traps_enab: Enable traps to generate in your world
